required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Food-Effect Study of AND017 in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Center, Randomized, Open-Label, Two-Sequence, Two-Period Crossover Study in Healthy Non-Elderly Chinese Subjects to Evaluate the Food Effect on the Pharmacokinetics of AND017 Following Oral Single-Dose Administration

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this phase I study is to evaluate the food effect on the PKs of AND017 following oral single-dose administration in healthy non-elderly Chinese subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a single-center, randomized, open-label, two-sequence, two-period crossover study in healthy non-elderly Chinese subjects to evaluate the food effect on the pharmacokinetics, as well as PD and safety of AND017 following oral single-dose administration

primary_outcome.description: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration for AND017
Area Under the Plasma Concentration-time Curve from Time 0 to Infinite Time for AND017

arm_group.description: Subjects were randomized to receive single dose of AND017 under fasted condition in Period 1 and under fed condition in Period 2
Subjects were randomized to receive single dose of AND017 under fed condition in Period 1 and under fasted condition in Period 2

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University
